ruling: - If a [[Sangan]] or a [[Witch of the Black Forest]] equipped with [[Malevolent Nuzzler]] is Tributed and you activate the effect of [[Malevolent Nuzzler]], [[Malevolent Nuzzler]] goes on top of your Deck and then [[Sangan]] or [[Witch of the Black Forest]] is resolved.  If [[Sangan]] is destroyed (not Tributed) the effects of [[Sangan]] and [[Malevolent Nuzzler]] are simultaneous and form a chain.
